SEARCH
Package game.java

Class BattleshipPlayer

java.lang.Object
game.java.BattleshipPlayer
public class BattleshipPlayer extends Object
Class that manages the state of the Battleship game for one player, with a board for hits on enemy and player ships.
Since:
hw3

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    BattleshipPlayer.BattleshipWinner
    Current state of the game: initial, in progress, this player won, this player's enemy won.

    Initializes the battleship game with empty grids, no ships added, and in the initial state of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleshipPlayer

      public BattleshipPlayer(int r, int c, String player)
      Initializes the battleship game with empty grids, no ships added, and in the initial state of the game.
      Parameters:
      r - desired number of rows for the battleship grid.
      c - desired number of columns for the battleship grid.
      player - string that designates this player as either player1 or player2 in the battleship game.
      Since:
      hw3

  • Method Details

      public BattleshipPlayer.BattleshipWinner getState()
      Returns the state of the Battleship game for this player.
      Returns:
      the state of the game.
      Since:
      hw3

    • ready

      public void ready(String player)
      Sets this player to be ready to play or notifies them that their opponent is ready.
      Parameters:
      player - player who is ready to play.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Returns true if this player is ready to play, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if this player is ready to play, false otherwise.

    • oppReady

      public boolean oppReady()
      Returns true if this player's opponent is ready to play, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if this player's opponent is ready to play, false otherwise.

    • getRestart

      public Boolean getRestart()
      Returns this player's vote to restart; true if they want to restart, false if they don't, null if they haven't voted yet.
      Returns:
      this player's vote to restart.

    • getOppRestart

      public Boolean getOppRestart()
      Returns this player's opponent's vote to restart; true if they want to restart, false if they don't, null if they haven't voted yet.
      Returns:
      this player's opponent's vote to restart.

    • getPlayer

      public String getPlayer()
      Returns this player's designation as player1 or player2 in the game.
      Returns:
      "player1" if this player is the server in the game, "player2" if this player is the client in the game.

    • voteToRestart

      public void voteToRestart(String player, boolean restart)
      Executes a player's vote on restarting the game or not.
      Parameters:
      player - player who is voting on the game to restart, should be player1 or player2.
      restart - true if player wants to restart, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player is not equal to "player1" or "player2"

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Resets the state of the game, clearing out the board and setting the state to the initial state
      Since:
      hw3

    • resize

      public void resize(int r, int c)
      Resizes the grid to a desired number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      r - desired new number of rows for the battleship grid.
      c - desired new number of columns for the battleship grid.

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(int l, int r, int c, Ship.Direction d)
      Place a ship of length l starting at row r and column c in the grid, either horizontally or vertically via a Direction enum.
      Parameters:
      l - desired length of ship.
      r - row index to place ship at.
      c - column index to place ship at.
      d - Direction of the ship, either Direction.HORIZONTAL or Direction.VERTICAL
      Returns:
      true if a ship was successfully placed without conflict with an existing ship, false otherwise.

    • moveShip

      public boolean moveShip(int rOld, int cOld, int r, int c)
      Move a ship at some location in the grid in the grid to row r, column c.
      Parameters:
      rOld - row index of ship we want to move.
      cOld - column index of ship we want to move.
      r - new row index for the ship.
      c - new column index for the ship.
      Returns:
      true if the ship was successfully moved, false otherwise.

    • removeShip

      public int removeShip(int r, int c)
      Removes a ship from the board at a specified location and returns its length, if a ship exists there.
      Parameters:
      r - row index of ship to remove
      c - column index of ship to remove
      Returns:
      length of the ship that was removed if there was a ship there, or -1 if there was not.
      Since:
      hw3

    • notifyWin

      public void notifyWin()
      Upon receiving information that this player won the game, this method should be called to set the state of the player to be "I WIN".

    • receiveShot

      public int receiveShot(int r, int c)
      Receive a shot from the enemy at row r, column c. Returns information about if a shit was shot/sunk or not.
      Parameters:
      r - row index user is shot at.
      c - column index user is shot at.
      Returns:
      -1 if none of the user's ships are shot or if the shot is out of bounds, 1 if a user's ship is hit, and 2 if a user's ship is sunk.
      Since:
      hw3

    • updateHitGrid

      public void updateHitGrid(int r, int c, int shipInfo)
      Updates this player's hit grid with information about hitting an enemy ship.
      Parameters:
      r - row index that an enemy was shot at.
      c - column index that an enemy was shot at.
      shipInfo - information about the enemy grid at location r,c. Should be 1, 2, or -1.
      shipInfo == 1 implies that an enemy ship exists at r,c and was shot.
      shipInfo == 2 implies that an enemy ship exists at r,c and was sunk.
      shipInfo == -1 implies that no enemy ship exists at r,c.
      Since:
      hw3

    • hitGridEntry

      public int hitGridEntry(int r, int c)
      Returns the entry in the hit grid at row r, column c
      Parameters:
      r - row index.
      c - column index.
      Returns:
      0 if this player has no information about enemy ships at row r, column c,
      -1 if this player knows the enemy has no ship at row r, column c via shooting,
      1 if this player knows the enemy has a ship at row r, column c via shooting at it,
      2 if this player knows the enemy has a ship at row r, column c that has been sunk.

    • noShipsRemain

      public boolean noShipsRemain()
      Returns true if this player has no live ships left i.e. they lost the game.
      Returns:
      true if this player has no live ships remaining and thus has lost the game.
      Since:
      hw3

    • shipData

      public int shipData(int r, int c)
      Returns information about this player's ship grid at row r, column c.
      Parameters:
      r - row index.
      c - column index.
      Returns:
      0 if this player has no ship at row r, column c, 1 if this player has a ship at row r, column c that has not been hit, 2 if this player has a ship at row r, column c that has been hit.
